metadata.description: An example pipeline that counts words in the input file.
metadata.name: Word Count

parameters.helpText: Path of the file pattern glob to read from - for example, gs://dataflow-samples/shakespeare/kinglear.txt
parameters.label: Input Cloud Storage file(s)
parameters.name: inputFile

parameters.helpText: Path and filename prefix for writing output files - for example, gs://MyBucket/counts
parameters.label: Output Cloud Storage file(s)
parameters.name: output
